translations.For more details check out the documenta: برای جزئیات بیشتر به مستندات مراجعه کنید.
translations.Please specify the port number along wit: Please specify the port number along with the host name (e.g., localhost:5432).
شما SQLite را به عنوان پایگاه داده انتخاب کردید.
translations.SQLite should only be used for minimal a: SQLite should only be used for minimal and development instances. For production we recommend a different database backend.
translations.If you use clients for file syncing, the: If you use clients for file syncing, the use of SQLite is highly discouraged.
translations.It looks like you are trying to reinstal: It looks like you are trying to reinstall your Nextcloud. However the file CAN_INSTALL is missing from your config directory. Please create the file CAN_INSTALL in your config folder to continue.
translations.Could not remove CAN_INSTALL from the co: Could not remove CAN_INSTALL from the config folder. Please remove this file manually.
translations.This application requires JavaScript for: This application requires JavaScript for correct operation. Please {linkstart}enable JavaScript{linkend} and reload the page.
translations.Please log in before granting %1$s acces: Please log in before granting %1$s access to your %2$s account.
translations.If you are not trying to set up a new de: If you are not trying to set up a new device or app, someone is trying to trick you into granting them access to your data. In this case do not proceed and instead contact your system administrator.
translations.You are about to grant %1$s access to yo: You are about to grant %1$s access to your %2$s account.
translations.Your client should now be connected!: Your client should now be connected!
translations.This share is password-protected: این اشتراک توسط رمز عبور محافظت می شود
translations.The password is wrong or expired. Please: The password is wrong or expired. Please try again or request a new one.
translations.Please type in your email address to req: Please type in your email address to request a temporary password
translations.You are not authorized to request a pass: You are not authorized to request a password for this share
translations.Enhanced security is enabled for your ac: Enhanced security is enabled for your account. Choose a second factor for authentication:
translations.Could not load at least one of your enab: Could not load at least one of your enabled two-factor auth methods. Please contact your admin.
translations.Two-factor authentication is enforced bu: Two-factor authentication is enforced but has not been configured on your account. Contact your admin for assistance.
Two-factor authentication is enforced but has not been configured on your account. Please continue to setup two-factor authentication.
Two-factor authentication is enforced but has not been configured on your account. Use one of your backup codes to log in or contact your admin for assistance.
translations.Enhanced security is enforced for your a: Enhanced security is enforced for your account. Choose which provider to set up:
translations.Error while validating your second facto: Error while validating your second factor
translations.Please contact your administrator. If yo: Please contact your administrator. If you are an administrator, edit the "trusted_domains" setting in config/config.php like the example in config.sample.php.
translations.Further information how to configure thi: Further information how to configure this can be found in the %1$sdocumentation%2$s.
translations.App update required: نیاز به بروزرسانی برنامه وجود دارد
translations.The following apps will be updated:: The following apps will be updated:
translations.These incompatible apps will be disabled: این برنامه‌های ناسازگار غیر فعال می‌شوند:
translations.Please make sure that the database, the: Please make sure that the database, the config folder and the data folder have been backed up before proceeding.
translations.To avoid timeouts with larger installati: برای جلوگیری از وقفه در نصب های طولانی تر، شما می توانید دستورات زیر را از مسیر نصبتان اجرا کنید:
translations.I know that if I continue doing the upda: I know that if I continue doing the update via web UI has the risk, that the request runs into a timeout and could cause data loss, but I have a backup and know how to restore my instance in case of a failure.
translations.Upgrade via web on my own risk: Upgrade via web on my own risk
translations.This %s instance is currently in mainten: This %s instance is currently in maintenance mode, which may take a while.
translations.This page will refresh itself when the i: This page will refresh itself when the instance is available again.
translations.Contact your system administrator if thi: اگر این پیغام همچنان وجود داشت یا به صورت غیر منتظره ظاهر شد با مدیر سیستم تماس بگیرید.
translations.The user limit of this instance is reach: The user limit of this instance is reached.
translations.Enter your subscription key in the suppo: Enter your subscription key in the support app in order to increase the user limit. This does also grant you all additional benefits that Nextcloud Enterprise offers and is highly recommended for the operation in companies.
translations.Your web server is not yet properly set: Your web server is not yet properly set up to allow file synchronization, because the WebDAV interface seems to be broken.
translations.Your web server is not properly set up t: Your web server is not properly set up to resolve "{url}". Further information can be found in the {linkstart}documentation ↗{linkend}.

Your web server is not properly set up to resolve "{url}". This is most likely related to a web server configuration that was not updated to deliver this folder directly. Please compare your configuration against the shipped rewrite rules in ".htaccess" for Apache or the provided one in the documentation for Nginx at it's {linkstart}documentation page ↗{linkend}. On Nginx those are typically the lines starting with "location ~" that need an update.

Your web server is not properly set up to deliver .woff2 files. This is typically an issue with the Nginx configuration. For Nextcloud 15 it needs an adjustement to also deliver .woff2 files. Compare your Nginx configuration to the recommended configuration in our {linkstart}documentation ↗{linkend}.
translations.You are accessing your instance over a s: You are accessing your instance over a secure connection, however your instance is generating insecure URLs. This most likely means that you are behind a reverse proxy and the overwrite config variables are not set correctly. Please read {linkstart}the documentation page about this ↗{linkend}.
translations.Your data directory and files are probab: Your data directory and files are probably accessible from the internet. The .htaccess file is not working. It is strongly recommended that you configure your web server so that the data directory is no longer accessible, or move the data directory outside the web server document root.
translations.The \"{header}\" HTTP header is not set: The "{header}" HTTP header is not set to "{expected}". This is a potential security or privacy risk, as it is recommended to adjust this setting accordingly.
The "{header}" HTTP header is not set to "{expected}". Some features might not work correctly, as it is recommended to adjust this setting accordingly.
translations.The \"{header}\" HTTP header does not co: The "{header}" HTTP header does not contain "{expected}". This is a potential security or privacy risk, as it is recommended to adjust this setting accordingly.
translations.The \"{header}\" HTTP header is not set: The "{header}" HTTP header is not set to "{val1}", "{val2}", "{val3}", "{val4}" or "{val5}". This can leak referer information. See the {linkstart}W3C Recommendation ↗{linkend}.
translations.The \"Strict-Transport-Security\" HTTP h: The "Strict-Transport-Security" HTTP header is not set to at least "{seconds}" seconds. For enhanced security, it is recommended to enable HSTS as described in the {linkstart}security tips ↗{linkend}.
translations.Accessing site insecurely via HTTP. You: Accessing site insecurely via HTTP. You are strongly advised to set up your server to require HTTPS instead, as described in the {linkstart}security tips ↗{linkend}. Without it some important web functionality like "copy to clipboard" or "service workers" will not work!
شناسه کاربری و کلمه عبور اشتباه است
translations.This action requires you to confirm your: این اقدام نیاز به تایید رمز عبور شما دارد
translations.Alternative log in using app token: Alternative log in using app token
translations.Please use the command line updater beca: Please use the command line updater because you have a big instance with more than 50 users.
